actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Resources.

actions.subcommittee: National Parks, Recreation and Public Lands
actions.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on National Parks, Recreation and Public Lands.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on National Parks, Recreation, and Public Lands

official_title: To direct the Secretary of the Interior to sell certain land to the town of Kingston, Nevada, for use as an emergency medical air evacuation site and for other public uses.

summary.text: Directs the Secretary of the Interior, acting through the Director of the Bureau of Land Management, to convey to the town of Kingston, Nevada, a specified airstrip parcel (by direct sale for fair market value) and an adjacent parcel (for no consideration).

titles.title: To direct the Secretary of the Interior to sell certain land to the town of Kingston, Nevada, for use as an emergency medical air evacuation site and for other public uses.
